notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: Michael Xiaoliang Tong wrote the original text. Alana Hansen, Scott Hanson-Easey and Peng Bi revised and edited the manuscript. Scott Cameron, Jianjun Xiang, Qiyong Liu, Yehuan Sun, Philip Weinstein, Gil-Soo Han and Craig Williams reviewed the document. All authors read and approved the final manuscript.
